description: The initiative, "Le Potager d'un Curieux," founded in the Luberon region, focuses on cultivating a diverse collection of plants and preserving heirloom seeds. Inspired by a 19th-century botanical work, the project emphasizes dynamic conservation, allowing seeds to thrive and adapt through cultivation. It aims to promote biodiversity, educate the community, and foster a connection to nature, while also addressing food sovereignty and the importance of traditional agricultural practices.
name: Le Potager d'un Curieux
